sentences.english: Manchester City have decided to retire their number 23 shirt in tribute to Marc-Vivien Foe.
sentences.chinese: 曼城已经决定将福的23号球衣封存以祭奠他。

sentences.english: City manager Joe Royle could barely contain his anger at the official's performance.
sentences.chinese: 曼城领队莱尔对球证表现感到怒不可遏。

sentences.english: The problem is that City need a right-back themselves.
sentences.chinese: 问题是曼城同样需要一名后防球员。

sentences.english: City’s recent purchase of Nasri really bumps them up here.
sentences.chinese: 曼城队最近购入的纳斯里凸显了他们在这方面的渴求。

sentences.english: There are now just four games remaining and Benitez accepts it will be tough to catch Tottenham and Man City.
sentences.chinese: 下面还有四场比赛，贝帅承认很难超越热刺和曼城了。

sentences.english: Their situation will depend on the result of Man Utd at Man City.
sentences.chinese: 他们的夺冠前景由曼城德比的结果决定。

sentences.english: Ferguson once derided the modern-day City as being "all talk".
sentences.chinese: 弗格森曾经嘲笑这支曼城队“光说不做”。

sentences.english: Manchester City may regret letting Daniel Sturridge slip away.
sentences.chinese: 曼城或许会后悔放走斯图里奇。

sentences.english: And both Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United have made moves for Huntelaar in the past.
sentences.chinese: 热刺和曼城在过去也求购过亨特拉尔。

sentences.english: "Sandro is emerging as a top player," he said after Tuesday night's defeat at City.
sentences.chinese: 在周二输给曼城之后，他这样说。

sentences.english: I'm a member of the Bluemoon Podcast Team, a Top 120 sports podcast that reports on Manchester City Football Club.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是蓝月博客团员，报道曼城足球俱乐部的赛事。

sentences.english: There is no doubt City can recover from a comprehensive defeat at Anfield to claim a top-four place.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，曼城能从兵败安菲尔德之役中恢复过来。

sentences.english: Man City have won none of their last five Premier league away games, losing three of these games.
sentences.chinese: 曼城近五个客场未尝胜绩，其中输了3场。

sentences.english: Capello has also met the FA's new chairman, David Bernstein.
sentences.chinese: 这位足协新掌门早前曾担任曼城俱乐部主席。

sentences.english: United will face local rivals Manchester City in the semi-finals of the Carling Cup.
sentences.chinese: 曼联将在联赛杯半决赛里对阵本地球队曼城。

sentences.english: That's not a lot of money for City to spend.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱对曼城来说不不算多。

definition: Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
